entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
